title: Mobile-Based Spatial Navigation Skill Acquisition Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized corporate education. Conducted exclusively via smartphones in PC-unavailable environments. Emphasizes practical skills applicable to real workplace navigation

learning_goals: Learners can navigate the shortest path to a target location in a 3D virtual space map with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze new spatial environments within 10 minutes using dynamic visual materials
Learners can successfully establish project-specific spatial utilization plans in real office environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
